entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigureKestrel Called During WebApplicationBuilder.Build in 6.0.9 #43993
  • Debug blazor server/wasm #43989
  • VS client generation causes build errors for default template #43987
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #43986
  • Produces and Accepts should target IEndpointConventionBuilder #43985
  • Produces<string>() should default to "text/plain" rather than "application/json" #43979
  • DataTransfer in DragEventArgs always empty #43976
    Backlog
  • Blazor empty template doesn't load scoped CSS #43975
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor] localStorage.getItem errors with complex objects #43974
  • FindByEmailAsync in the UserOnlyStore is not actually an Async call #43973
  • Angular universal with .net 6 #43970
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error BLAZOR102 The scoped css file 'Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.css' was defined but no associated razor component or view was found for it. Fake.Web D:\dotNet\FakeMelySite\Fake.Web\Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.css 1 #43967

Closed

  • `FromFormAttribute.Name` not respected by `ApiParameterDescription.Name` #43815
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor CultureInfo.CurrentCulture Always Returning en-US #43977
  • Kestrel's GetClientCertificateAsync caches failures #41369
    7.0-rc2
  • Request Throttling for ASP.NET Core #29933
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #43935
  • Perf regression: json_actix #43936
  • RequestDelegateFactory should infer IProducesResponseTypeMetadata #43675
    7.0-rc2
  • CLI Hot reload Blazor wasm just doesn't work. #40587
    7.0-rc2
  • Rate and Concurrency limiting middleware #32032
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Move Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Server into the shared framework #25643
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clean syntax for Razor-emitting methods (avoiding __builder, _builder2, …) #37907
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Existing hot reload deltas aren't applied until after the application starts #36913
    .NET 7 Planning
  • More integration for Blazor Server and SignalR #38109
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Slow Blazor wasm build in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 5.0 based #38476
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .Net 7 ApiAuthorization compatibility with Identity Server 6.1.x #43741
  • Hosting bundle gets updated with OS upgrades causing issue. #43790
  • Blazor wasm application's Hot Reload fails when SignalR is enabled #43939
  • Blazor custom elements shouldn't require explicit script reference to BlazorCustomElements.js #43710
    7.0-rc2
  • Changing Environment Variables causes error in Blazor WASM .NET Core hosted .NET 6.0 #43843
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SignalR failing to send messages to client #43950
  • Live preview Blazor #43963
  • Missing project template translations for 'Do not use top-level statements' option in .NET 6.0.300 SDK #41802
    6.0.x
  • Problem with body parameters when using `WithOpenApi()` from `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #43938

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding retries to AddsExpectedItems #43995
    area-infrastructure
  • Stabilize versions for 7.0.0 RTM #43992
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • Improve file fallback routing behavior when using ConsumesAttribute #43984
    area-runtime
  • Update facebook OAuth API version to 14, google to v3 #43982
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43980
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Try tests on scouting osx queue #43978
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Merge internal commits from RC1 #43988
    tell-mode, area-web-frameworks
  • ARMv6 dotnet doesn't support Crossgen2, so in order to compile as Release it must be disabled for this platform #43971
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [7.0] Close connections on client cert failures #43958
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Continue using typeof(void) for empty TypedResults #43990
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Infer response metadata in RequestDelegateFactory #43961
    Servicing-consider, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] MSAL updates #43954
    area-blazor
  • [release/2.1] Remove most non-Windows build job support #43968
    2.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Stop building / testing on Ubuntu 18.04 #43947
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43955
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Explains that AddJsonOptions will use web defaults #43921
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #43952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.10

Updated

  • Add Error Logging for the Blazor DebugProxyLauncher #43721
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-debugging, 7.0-rc2
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
    area-infrastructure
  • Changing to use the non-generic WriteAsJsonAsync #43960
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1993142 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #43951
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.30
